item.title: Resume
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description: Resume of Huang Yanjie Survey：three years working experience | male | 25 years old (December 22, 1996) | unmarried | 177cm Telephone：15606902050 E-mail： wawmmb@sina.cn Address：Putian,Fujian Industry：Embedded/Internet of things/consumer electronics Position：Senior Software Engineer School：Xiamen Institute of Technology Education：undergraduate Major：electronic information engineering Work Experience 2020.3~now：L&T Display Technology(Fujian)Ltd 1 year and 11 months Position: Senior Software Engineer Department: product R & D department Commercial display Project Be responsible for debugging and debugging Linux with Android system display on large screen such as commercial display, cooperate with QA department in the plant to debug its corresponding functions through the application layer, analyze the problems raised by QA, and output the corresponding software engineering specifications of commercial display model.

item.title: Autojs
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Introduction to Auto.JS

  Auto. JS is a JavaScript automation tool on Android platform. Its essence is that it can execute simple JavaScript scripts written by itself, especially an android app that can perform some operations on other apps when “barrier free mode” is turned on, which is convenient for automatic operation.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Wechat-Applet
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Introduction to wechat applet

  The main development language of applet is JavaScript. Compared with ordinary web page development, the development of applet is very similar. For front-end developers, the development cost of migrating from web development to applet is not high, but the two are still a little different.

item.title: Smart-Home
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Introduction to Smart-Home

  Smart home is a residential platform, which integrates the facilities related to home life by using generic cabling technology, network communication technology, security prevention technology, automatic control technology and audio and video technology, constructs an efficient management system of residential facilities and family schedule affairs, improves the safety, convenience, comfort and artistry of home, and realizes an environment-friendly and energy-saving living environment.

item.title: Test-Tooling
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Introduction to test tooling

  The so-called test tooling is the equipment used to test whether the product meets the expected index. When the product is unqualified, the test tooling will respond accordingly.

item.title: Xintang-Project-Hall-Induction
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Project introduction

  Based on the new Tang chip ms51fb9ae chip, the T16 knob on light PCB is designed, and its corresponding knob function program is written.

item.title: Xintang-Project-Digital-Display
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Project introduction

  Based on Xintang chip ms51fb9ae chip, the schematic PCB of T10 window board is designed, and its corresponding digital display function program is written.

item.title: Hetai-Project
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Project introduction

  Based on the BS84B08A-3 touch chip of Hetai chip, the T10 foam shield board principle diagram PCB is designed, and its corresponding touch function program is written.

item.title: Electronic-Contest
item.author: wawmmb@sina.cn (Dustin Huang)
item.description:
Introduction to test tooling

  It is required that the trolley be charged at a fixed time for one minute, and the trolley can climb the slope and follow the road according to the infrared reception.
